$\frac{1-k}{5/18} = \frac{k}{1/2} \Leftrightarrow \frac{18(1-k)}{5} = 2k \Leftrightarrow 18-18k = 10k \Leftrightarrow 28k=18 \Leftrightarrow k=\frac{18}{28} = \frac{9}{14}$.

title: C√¢u 9.
solution:
T·ª´ gi·∫£ thi·∫øt:
$\overrightarrow{MA}.\overrightarrow{MB} + \overrightarrow{MA}.\overrightarrow{MC} = 25$
$\Leftrightarrow \frac{1}{2}(MA^2 + MB^2 - AB^2) + \frac{1}{2}(MA^2 + MC^2 - AC^2) = 25$
$\Leftrightarrow 2MA^2 + MB^2 + MC^2 - AB^2 - AC^2 = 50$.
V√¨ $AB=AC=5$ n√™n $AB^2=AC^2=25$.
$\Leftrightarrow 2MA^2 + MB^2 + MC^2 - 25 - 25 = 50 \Leftrightarrow 2MA^2 + MB^2 + MC^2 = 100$.
G·ªçi $D$ l√† ƒëi·ªÉm th·ªèa m√£n $2\overrightarrow{DA}+\overrightarrow{DB}+\overrightarrow{DC}=0$.
T·ª´ $2\overrightarrow{DA}+\overrightarrow{DB}+\overrightarrow{DC}=0 \Rightarrow 2\overrightarrow{DA}+2\overrightarrow{DI}=0 \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{DA}+\overrightarrow{DI}=0$.
$\Rightarrow D$ l√† trung ƒëi·ªÉm c·ªßa ƒëo·∫°n th·∫≥ng $AI$.
Ta c√≥ $2MA^2 + MB^2 + MC^2 = 4MD^2 + 2DA^2 + DB^2 + DC^2$.
$AB=AC=5$, $BC=5\sqrt{2}$. G·ªçi $I$ l√† trung ƒëi·ªÉm $BC$. $AI=\frac{BC}{2} = \frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2}$.
$DA = \frac{1}{2}AI = \frac{1}{4}BC = \frac{5\sqrt{2}}{4}$.
$DB = DC = \sqrt{IB^2 + ID^2} = \sqrt{\left(\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2}\right)^2 + \left(\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{4}\right)^2} = \sqrt{\frac{50}{4} + \frac{50}{16}} = \sqrt{\frac{200+50}{16}} = \sqrt{\frac{250}{16}} = \frac{5\sqrt{10}}{4}$.
Suy ra
$2MA^2 + MB^2 + MC^2 = 4MD^2 +2DA^2 + DB^2 + DC^2 = 4MD^2 + 2\left(\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{4}\right)^2 + 2\left(\frac{5\sqrt{10}}{4}\right)^2 = 4MD^2 + 2\frac{50}{16} + 2\frac{250}{16} = 4MD^2 + \frac{100+500}{16} = 4MD^2 + \frac{600}{16} = 4MD^2 + \frac{75}{2}$.
Ta c√≥ k·∫øt qu·∫£:
$4MD^2 + \frac{75}{2} = 100 \Rightarrow 4MD^2 = 100 - \frac{75}{2} = \frac{125}{2} \Rightarrow MD^2 = \frac{125}{8}$.
Nh∆∞ v·∫≠y $(S)$ l√† ƒë∆∞·ªùng tr√≤n t√¢m $D$ b√°n k√≠nh $R = \sqrt{\frac{125}{8}} = \frac{5\sqrt{5}}{2\sqrt{2}} = \frac{5\sqrt{10}}{4}$.
V·∫≠y $a=5; b=4 \Rightarrow T = 50.5 +4.4 = 250+16 = 266$.

title: C√¢u 11.
solution:
ƒê·∫∑t $\overrightarrow{AB} = \vec{a}$; $\overrightarrow{AD} = \vec{b}$. Ta c√≥ $|\vec{a}|=3, |\vec{b}|=3$. $\vec{a}.\vec{b}=0$.
$M \in AB$ v·ªõi $BM=1 \Rightarrow AM=2$. $\overrightarrow{AM} = \frac{2}{3}\vec{a}$. $\overrightarrow{MB} = \frac{1}{3}\vec{a}$.
$N \in CD$ v·ªõi $DN=1 \Rightarrow NC=2$. $\overrightarrow{DN} = \frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{DC} = \frac{1}{3}\vec{a}$. $\overrightarrow{CN} = \frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{CD} = -\frac{2}{3}\vec{a}$.
$P$ l√† trung ƒëi·ªÉm $BC$. $\overrightarrow{BP} = \frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{BC} = \frac{1}{2}\vec{b}$.
$\overrightarrow{NM} = \overrightarrow{AM} - \overrightarrow{AN} = \frac{2}{3}\vec{a} - (\overrightarrow{AD}+\overrightarrow{DN}) = \frac{2}{3}\vec{a} - (\vec{b}+\frac{1}{3}\vec{a}) = \frac{1}{3}\vec{a}-\vec{b}$.
$\overrightarrow{NP} = \overrightarrow{BP} - \overrightarrow{BN} = \frac{1}{2}\vec{b} - (\overrightarrow{BC}+\overrightarrow{CN}) = \frac{1}{2}\vec{b} - (\vec{b}-\frac{2}{3}\vec{a}) = \frac{2}{3}\vec{a} - \frac{1}{2}\vec{b}$.
$\overrightarrow{NM}.\overrightarrow{NP} = (\frac{1}{3}\vec{a}-\vec{b}).(\frac{2}{3}\vec{a}-\frac{1}{2}\vec{b}) = \frac{2}{9}\vec{a}^2 - \frac{1}{6}\vec{a}.\vec{b} - \frac{2}{3}\vec{a}.\vec{b} + \frac{1}{2}\vec{b}^2 = \frac{2}{9}|\vec{a}|^2 + \frac{1}{2}|\vec{b}|^2$.
$= \frac{2}{9}.3^2 + \frac{1}{2}.3^2 = 2 + \frac{9}{2} = \frac{13}{2}$.
$|\overrightarrow{NM}|^2 = (\frac{1}{3}\vec{a}-\vec{b})^2 = \frac{1}{9}|\vec{a}|^2 - \frac{2}{3}\vec{a}.\vec{b} + |\vec{b}|^2 = \frac{1}{9}.3^2 + 3^2 = 1+9=10$. $|\overrightarrow{NM}|=\sqrt{10}$.
$|\overrightarrow{NP}|^2 = (\frac{2}{3}\vec{a}-\frac{1}{2}\vec{b})^2 = \frac{4}{9}|\vec{a}|^2 - \frac{2}{3}\vec{a}.\vec{b} + \frac{1}{4}|\vec{b}|^2 = \frac{4}{9}.3^2 + \frac{1}{4}.3^2 = 4 + \frac{9}{4} = \frac{25}{4}$. $|\overrightarrow{NP}|=\frac{5}{2}$.
$\cos \widehat{MNP} = \frac{\overrightarrow{NM}.\overrightarrow{NP}}{|\overrightarrow{NM}|.|\overrightarrow{NP}|} = \frac{13/2}{\sqrt{10}.5/2} = \frac{13}{5\sqrt{10}} = \frac{13\sqrt{10}}{50} \approx 0,822$.
OCR output: $\cos \widehat{MNP} = \frac{13}{5\sqrt{10}}$.
So I'll just use the OCR result.

title: C√¢u 15.

ƒê·∫∑t $\overrightarrow{AB} = \vec{a}$; $\overrightarrow{AC} = \vec{b}$; $AP = x$ ($0 < x <3$).

$\overrightarrow{AM} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \overrightarrow{BM} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{BC} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{2}{3}(\overrightarrow{AC}-\overrightarrow{AB}) = \frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{AB}+\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{AC} = \frac{1}{3}\vec{a}+\frac{2}{3}\vec{b}$.
Ta c√≥:
$\overrightarrow{PN} = \overrightarrow{AN} - \overrightarrow{AP} = \frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{AC} - \frac{x}{3}\overrightarrow{AB} = -\frac{x}{3}\vec{a}+\frac{1}{3}\vec{b}$.
ƒêi·ªÅu ki·ªán $\overrightarrow{AM} \perp \overrightarrow{PN} \Leftrightarrow \overrightarrow{AM}.\overrightarrow{PN}=0$.

$\Leftrightarrow -\frac{x}{9}\vec{a}^2 + \frac{1}{9}\vec{a}.\vec{b} - \frac{2x}{9}\vec{a}.\vec{b} + \frac{2}{9}\vec{b}^2 = 0$
$\Leftrightarrow -\frac{x}{9}|\vec{a}|^2 + \frac{1}{9}\vec{a}.\vec{b} - \frac{2x}{9}\vec{a}.\vec{b} + \frac{2}{9}|\vec{b}|^2 = 0$.
V·ªõi $|\vec{a}|=3, |\vec{b}|=3$, $\vec{a}.\vec{b} = |\vec{a}||\vec{b}|\cos 60^\circ = 3.3.\frac{1}{2} = \frac{9}{2}$.
$\Leftrightarrow -\frac{x}{9}.3^2 + \frac{1}{9}.\frac{9}{2} - \frac{2x}{9}.\frac{9}{2} + \frac{2}{9}.3^2 = 0$
$\Leftrightarrow -x + \frac{1}{2} - x + 2 = 0$
$\Leftrightarrow -2x + \frac{5}{2} = 0 \Leftrightarrow 2x = \frac{5}{2} \Leftrightarrow x = \frac{5}{4}$. (th·ªèa m√£n).
V·∫≠y $AP = \frac{5}{4} = 1,25$.

title: C√¢u 16.
solution:
T·ª´ $\overrightarrow{MA} + \overrightarrow{MB} = \vec{0} \Rightarrow M$ l√† trung ƒëi·ªÉm $AB$.

T·ª´ $\overrightarrow{BC} = k\overrightarrow{BP} \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{BP} = \frac{1}{k}\overrightarrow{BC}$.
Ta c√≥ $\overrightarrow{MN} = \overrightarrow{AN} - \overrightarrow{AM} = \frac{3}{5}\overrightarrow{AC} - \frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{AB}$.
$\overrightarrow{NP} = \overrightarrow{AP} - \overrightarrow{AN}$.
$\overrightarrow{AP} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \overrightarrow{BP} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{1}{k}\overrightarrow{BC} = \overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{1}{k}(\overrightarrow{AC}-\overrightarrow{AB}) = (1-\frac{1}{k})\overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{1}{k}\overrightarrow{AC}$.
$\overrightarrow{NP} = (1-\frac{1}{k})\overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{1}{k}\overrightarrow{AC} - \frac{3}{5}\overrightarrow{AC} = (1-\frac{1}{k})\overrightarrow{AB} + (\frac{1}{k}-\frac{3}{5})\overrightarrow{AC}$.
ƒê·ªÉ ba ƒëi·ªÉm $M, N, P$ th·∫≥ng h√†ng th√¨ $\exists m \in \mathbb{R} : \overrightarrow{NP} = m\overrightarrow{MN}$.
$(1-\frac{1}{k})\overrightarrow{AB} + (\frac{1}{k}-\frac{3}{5})\overrightarrow{AC} = m\left(-\frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{AB} + \frac{3}{5}\overrightarrow{AC}\right)$.
Do $\overrightarrow{AB}, \overrightarrow{AC}$ kh√¥ng c√πng ph∆∞∆°ng n√™n
$\begin{cases} 1-\frac{1}{k} = -\frac{m}{2} \\ \frac{1}{k}-\frac{3}{5} = \frac{3m}{5} \end{cases}$.

$\frac{1}{k}-\frac{3}{5} = \frac{6}{5k} - \frac{6}{5}$.

title: C√¢u 35.

Ta c√≥: $H (x;y)$ l√† tr·ª±c t√¢m c·ªßa tam gi√°c $ABC$. Suy ra:
$\overrightarrow{AH} = (x+1; y-4)$. $\overrightarrow{BC} = (2-(-4); -2-0) = (6;-2)$.
$\overrightarrow{AH} \perp \overrightarrow{BC} \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{AH}.\overrightarrow{BC} = 0 \Leftrightarrow (x+1).6+(y-4).(-2) = 0 \Leftrightarrow 6x+6-2y+8 = 0 \Leftrightarrow 6x-2y = -14 \Leftrightarrow 3x - y = -7 (*)$.
$\overrightarrow{BH} = (x+4; y-0) = (x+4;y)$. $\overrightarrow{AC} = (2-(-1); -2-4) = (3;-6)$.
$\overrightarrow{BH} \perp \overrightarrow{AC} \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{BH}.\overrightarrow{AC} = 0 \Leftrightarrow (x+4).3+y.(-6) = 0 \Leftrightarrow 3x+12-6y = 0 \Leftrightarrow 3x-6y = -12 \Leftrightarrow x - 2y = -4 (**)$.
T·ª´ $(*)$ v√† $(**)$ ta c√≥:
$\begin{cases} 3x - y = -7 \\ x - 2y = -4 \end{cases} \Leftrightarrow \begin{cases} y = 3x+7 \\ x - 2(3x+7) = -4 \end{cases} \Leftrightarrow \begin{cases} y = 3x+7 \\ x - 6x - 14 = -4 \end{cases} \Leftrightarrow \begin{cases} y = 3x+7 \\ -5x = 10 \end{cases} \Leftrightarrow \begin{cases} x = -2 \\ y = 3(-2)+7 = 1 \end{cases}$.
